title: Two Bedroom (All Ensuite) — Kilimani (off Agwings Kodhek Road)
short: Modern two-bedroom apartment — both ensuite, balcony, rooftop gym & pool.
desc: Modern two-bedroom apartment, both ensuite, located in Kilimani just off Agwings Kodhek Road. Spacious living room, fitted kitchen, secure parking and 24-hour security.

title: Two Bedroom (All Ensuite) — Off Lenana Road
short: Stylish two-bedroom apartment near Yaya Centre with generator & parking.
desc: Stylish two-bedroom apartment (all ensuite) off Lenana Road. Modern finishes, backup generator, balcony, and 24-hour security. Walking distance to Yaya Centre.

title: One Bedroom Apartment — Tatu City
short: Elegant one-bedroom apartment in secure gated Tatu City community.
desc: Modern one-bedroom apartment in Tatu City with balcony, fitted kitchen, parking and green environment. Perfect for professionals or small families.
